l:item.ofx:paragraph: The beans module is responsible for the data processing and includes the business logic of the system.
The client contains several executeables to directly connect to the application server.
The complete documentation of the system is available in the doc module.
The ear module (also known as Enterprise Application Archive) combines other modules and can be deployed on an application server.
The domain object model is defined in the entities module. With use of object-relational-mapping the database structure is created.
The interfaces module describes interfaces shared by other modules.
The interfaces module provides factories and tools.
The web module contains the graphical user interface (GUI) for the web application.
The xml module implements a data model used for web service communication.
